name: Hydro Steam
description: You blast the target with boiling-hot water. Make a ranged attack, dealing 2d6 + MOVE water damage on a hit. This move's damage is not subject to disadvantage in Harsh Sunlight. If you are in Harsh Sunlight, you make the attack with advantage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
